title: Tests Hypotheses Using Biased and Unbiased Urn Models
text: set functions compute p-values perform sensitivity analysis, adapting Fisher’s p-value test case studies process tracing. uses unbiased biased urn models draw null distributions absence randomization.

title: Tests Hypotheses Using Biased and Unbiased Urn Models
text: name package Dr. Murial Bristol, better known “tea lady” Fisher’s p-value demonstration. Fewer people aware “lady” fellow researcher Rothamsted Research institute. Beyond brilliant scientist , Dr. Bristol indeed taste whether tea milk poured first cup, evidence suggests.
